Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2012 07:39AM andeerae wrote: I had my double mastectomy with immediate silicone impants on November 7th.  It was exactly 9 weeks for me to feel normal.  I can lay on my stomach and dress myself and do yard work without any pain.  However, it was a LONGGGGGGGG 9 weeks.  and at weeks 6-7, I thought I was never going to feel normal ever again.  It felt like I had the worlds tightest bra on with thick underwires poking me everywhere.  Now, my left breast (the one that had the breast cancer) is still numb towards the arm pit where they removed the nodes and on the left side of my actual breast. But, I promose, it does get better. Hang in there!
Posts.Title: Six weeks out from PBMX Cats134 Cats134
